# Dependent (Drawback)
## Overview
**Dependent:** You are dependent upon the acceptance of others. Whenever you fail a [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] check, you become [[Shaken|shaken]] for 1 hour.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
